message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this excellent product for a competitive price of $20,000. I believe it will be incredibly beneficial for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I can't go higher than $12,000. Let me know if you're open to that.

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $20,000 represents the true value of this product, I understand your budget constraints.  Could you consider $17,000?  I'm confident you'll find it's a worthwhile investment.
Alice, $17,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $14,000. This is my final offer, let me know if you're interested.
